引用 

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/datetimepicker.css" />
    <script type="text/javascript" src="../js/datetimepicker/datetimepicker.js"></script>
datetimepicker 日期控件
基本使用 ， 大小
HTML Javascript 

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input c-input-mini date-picker date-picker-demo">

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input c-input-small date-picker date-picker-demo">

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input c-input-medium date-picker date-picker-demo">

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input c-input-large date-picker date-picker-demo">


    $('.date-picker').datetimepicker();
datetimepicker 日期控件
年-月-日
HTML Javascript 

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input date-picker" id="DatePickerDemo">


    $('#DatePickerDemo').datetimepicker({
        timepicker:false,
        format:'Y-m-d'
    });
datetimepicker 日期控件
平面显示
HTML Javascript 

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input date-picker" id="inlineDatePickerDemo">


    $('#inlineDatePickerDemo').datetimepicker({
        inline:true,
        weeks:true
    });
datetimepicker 日期控件
时间段
HTML Javascript 

    <input type="text" placeholder="" class="c-input date-picker" id="minMaxDatePickerDemo">


    $('#minMaxDatePickerDemo').datetimepicker({
        timepicker:false,
        formatDate:'Y/m/d',
        format:'Y-m-d',
        minDate:'-1970/01/02',
        maxDate:'+1970/01/02'
    });
从 到
datetimepicker 日期控件
开始时间到结束时间
HTML Javascript 

    <span>从</span>
    <input type="text" placeholder="" id="startDatePickerDemo" class="c-input c-input-medium date-picker">
    <span>到</span>
    <input type="text" placeholder="" id="endDatePickerDemo" class="c-input c-input-medium date-picker">



    $('#startDatePickerDemo').datetimepicker({
        format:'Y-m-d',
        onShow:function( ct ){
            this.setOptions({
                maxDate:$('#endDatePickerDemo').val()?$('#endDatePickerDemo').val():false
            })
        },
        timepicker:false
    });

    $('#endDatePickerDemo').datetimepicker({
        format:'Y-m-d',
        onShow:function( ct ){
            this.setOptions({
                minDate:$('#startDatePickerDemo').val()?$('#startDatePickerDemo').val():false
            })
        },
        timepicker:false
    });
